predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing PMI (headline) for September 2025 will print between 47.5 and 49.5 in the ISM release on 2025-10-01.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the September 2025 ISM Manufacturing PMI headline index value in the ISM Manufacturing Report On Business published 2025-10-01.
monitoring_signals: Chicago, Dallas, Richmond, Philly Fed manufacturing indices
S&P Global US Manufacturing PMI final for September
ISM supplier deliveries and new orders components
predictions.rationale: Regional Fed surveys and soft orders suggest contractionary manufacturing with stabilization near high-40s.

predictions.text: ADP National Employment Report change for September 2025 will be between 120,000 and 190,000 in the release on 2025-10-01.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the total private payroll change for September 2025 in the ADP National Employment Report published on 2025-10-01.
monitoring_signals: High-frequency payroll data from Homebase/UKG
Job postings levels (Indeed, LinkUp)
Initial and continuing jobless claims trends
predictions.rationale: Hiring remains resilient but cooling; ADP typically tracks private payrolls below 200k in slowing labor markets.

predictions.text: U.S. Average Hourly Earnings (total private, seasonally adjusted) month-over-month for September 2025 will print between 0.20% and 0.40% in the BLS Employment Situation on 2025-10-03.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the 1-month percentage change for series CES0500000003 in the BLS Employment Situation news release dated 2025-10-03.
monitoring_signals: Wage trackers (Atlanta Fed Wage Growth Tracker)
Average weekly hours changes
Industry mix shifts in payroll gains
predictions.rationale: Wage growth is moderating with cooler labor demand and easing job switching.

predictions.text: Euro area HICP (headline, YoY, flash) for September 2025 will print between 2.3% and 2.7% in Eurostat’s release on 2025-10-02.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the flash estimate YoY HICP for September 2025 on ec.europa.eu/eurostat in the 2025-10-02 news release.
monitoring_signals: Country CPI flashes (Germany, Spain, France, Italy)
Energy price movements and base effects
Core goods vs services inflation components
predictions.rationale: Energy base effects fade while services remain sticky; headline near mid-2s plausible.

predictions.text: The U.S. AAA national average price for regular gasoline will print at or below $3.40 per gallon on at least one day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the daily national average for regular gasoline on gasprices.aaa.com; any reading ≤ $3.40 before or on 2025-10-31 counts.
monitoring_signals: WTI/Brent price trends and refining margins
EIA gasoline inventories and product supplied
Seasonal demand slowdown post-summer
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand drop and stable crude suggest modest retail price easing into October.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-15, OPEC+ will issue an official statement maintaining current production targets with no net increase for November–December 2025.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via an official press release or communiqué on opec.org or an OPEC Secretariat/JMMC statement stating no net increase to group targets for Nov–Dec 2025.
monitoring_signals: Saudi and Russian guidance on voluntary cuts
Market balances and OECD inventories
Brent time spreads indicating tightness
predictions.rationale: Producers likely sustain discipline amid uncertain demand and inventory rebuilding.

predictions.text: NVIDIA (NVDA) Q3 FY2026 revenue will be between $32.0B and $35.0B, per the company’s earnings release or Form 10-Q published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm GAAP revenue for the quarter ending around Oct 2025 in NVIDIA’s press release or 10-Q filed on sec.gov by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Data center GPU supply and lead times
Cloud capex commentary (hyperscalers)
Export restrictions and product mix
predictions.rationale: Data center demand remains robust; supply expansions support sequential growth within a broad range.

predictions.text: TSMC (2330.TW) consolidated revenue year-over-year change for September 2025 will be between +20% and +30% in the company’s monthly revenue report published by 2025-10-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check TSMC’s September 2025 monthly revenue press release on tsmc.com; compute YoY growth vs September 2024.
monitoring_signals: HPC/AI wafer starts and advanced node utilization
Smartphone seasonality and Apple supply chain signals
Exchange rate TWD/USD impact on reported figures
predictions.rationale: Advanced node demand and AI-related orders drive strong double-digit growth off a high 2024 base.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–New York weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-10-31 will be at least 15% higher than its 2025-09-05 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry WCI Shanghai–New York rate from the 2025-09-05 report to any subsequent weekly report up to 2025-10-31; increase ≥ 15% satisfies.
monitoring_signals: Transpacific demand and blank sailings
Port congestion and Panama Canal constraints
Bunker fuel prices and GRIs announced by carriers
predictions.rationale: Tight capacity, GRIs, and resilient U.S. import demand support higher Transpacific East Coast rates.

predictions.text: EUR/JPY (Yahoo Finance: EURJPY=X) will trade at or above 165.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Observe the intraday high on Yahoo Finance (EURJPY=X) or equivalent reputable data source; any print ≥ 165.00 by 2025-11-30 counts.
monitoring_signals: ECB policy guidance vs BoJ YCC normalization pace
Rate differentials (Germany 2Y vs Japan 2Y)
Risk sentiment and carry trade dynamics
predictions.rationale: Wide rate differentials and persistent carry support EUR strength vs JPY barring abrupt BoJ tightening.
